Method Documentation

+ (void) addObserver: (id)  anObserver
forCurrencyKey: (NSString *)  aKey
selector: (SEL)  aSelector 

Registers observer to get notifications about Wallet updates for specified currency key as configured on Flurry AppSpot.

Parameters
anObserveran object that will receive notifications about Wallet updates
aKeyThe "currency" key to track Wallet updates, exactly as configured on Flurry AppSpot account
aSelectorselector with signature -[flurryWalletUpdated:(FlurryWalletInfo *)aWalletInfo error:(NSError *)anError] that sent to anObserver when currency represented by aKey is updated.
+ (NSUInteger) addObserverForCurrencyKey: (NSString *)  aKey
withHandler: (FlurryWalletUpdateHandler)  aHandler 

Registers block to be called on Wallet updates for specified currency key as configured on Flurry AppSpot.

Parameters
aKeyThe "currency" key to track Wallet updates, exactly as configured on Flurry AppSpot account
aHandlerblock that is called when currency represented by aKey is updated.
Returns
id of registered observer block that can be used for unregistration
+ (void) decrementWalletForCurrencyKey: (NSString *)  aKey
byAmount: (NSNumber *)  anAmount
completionHandler: (FlurryWalletCommonOperationCompletionHandler)  aHandler 

Decrements given field by given value for current object.

Parameters
aKeyThe key to be decremented.
aValueThe decrement, must be greater than zero.
aHandlerThe completion handler
+ (float) getLastReceivedValueForCurrencyKey: (NSString *)  aKey

Gets wallet value for given key.

Parameters
aKeyThe key to get object for.
Returns
The stored current value. Returns 0 if value for given key was not found.
+ (void) removeObserver: (id)  anObserver

Unregisters observer from notifications about Wallet updates for all currency keys.

Parameters
anObserveran object that was registered to receive notifications about Wallet updates
+ (void) removeObserver: (id)  anObserver
forCurrencyKey: (NSString *)  aKey 

Unregisters observer from notifications about Wallet updates for specified currency key.

Parameters
anObserveran object that was registered to receive notifications about Wallet updates
aKeyThe currency key to track Wallet updates

Unregisters block from notifications about Wallet updates for specified currency key.

Parameters
anIDan id of previously registered block
